items.content_html: Easy Viewer is a modern database management tool inspired by DBeaver, but built on the Tauri framework. It is designed to provide a lightweight, efficient, and user-friendly experience for managing and interacting with databases. Easy Viewer supports a wide range of database formats.
items.title: lsk569937453/easy-viewer: Easy Viewer is a modern database management tool inspired by DBeaver, but built on the Tauri framework. It is designed to provide a lightweight, efficient, and user-friendly experience for managing and interacting with databases. Easy Viewer supports a wide range of database formats.
